Requirement / AC / Bug: AC1.1: Dedicated catalog in Sonic portal
Test Steps: 1. Navigate to Sonic portal. 2. Locate documentation section.
Expected Result: Catalog is present and accessible from the portal.

Requirement / AC / Bug: AC1.2: Catalog search bar filters docs
Test Steps: 1. Enter a search term in the catalog search bar. 2. Observe the results.
Expected Result: Results are filtered to docs only by default.

Test Steps: 1. Favourite a doc. 2. Go to catalog homepage. 3. Check for Favourites section.
Expected Result: Favourites section displays user-favourited docs.

Test Steps: 1. Open catalog. 2. Sort docs by 'Recently Updated'
Expected Result: 'Most Popular'
column6: Docs are sorted as per selected criteria.

Test Steps: Type
Expected Result: Rating
column8: Docs list updates according to selected filters.

Test Steps: 1. Click a doc link in catalog.
Expected Result: Full doc content is displayed in a user-friendly format.

Test Steps: 1. Search for a term. 2. Apply filters to results.
Expected Result: Search results update according to filters.

Test Steps: 1. Open a doc. 2. Rate the doc. 3. Click 'Provide Feedback'.
Expected Result: Rating is saved; feedback form opens and submits successfully.

Test Steps: 1. Open a doc. 2. View metrics section.
Expected Result: Page views and unique visitors are displayed.

Test Steps: 1. Open a doc with embedded video/diagram. 2. Play video/view diagram.
Expected Result: Video plays and diagrams render correctly.

Test Steps: 1. Go to docs main page. 2. Check for 'Sort by' dropdown.
Expected Result: 'Sort by' dropdown is present as per design.

Test Steps: 1. Go to docs catalog. 2. Check for Category filter.
Expected Result: Category filter is present with correct values.

Test Steps: 1. Navigate through doc sections. 2. Observe URL changes.
Expected Result: URLs are well-formatted and update per navigation.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc with code block. 2. Check code block style.
Expected Result: Code blocks use correct font and syntax highlighting.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc with images. 2. Check image rendering.
Expected Result: Images load successfully.

Test Steps: 1. Compare doc count in Sonic and Backstage.
Expected Result: Doc counts are within expected difference (<10).

Test Steps: 1. Rate a doc in table view. 2. Reopen feedback.
Expected Result: Feedback popup opens for new review

Test Steps: 1. Change sort order. 2. Try to reset to default.
Expected Result: Option to reset to default sort is available.

Test Steps: 1. Sort docs by popularity. 2. Hard reload page.
Expected Result: View counts persist after reload.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc and subchapter. 2. Check view KPI.
Expected Result: View count is for main doc

Test Steps: 1. Open Observability doc. 2. Check hierarchy and subchapter names.
Expected Result: Hierarchy and names match Backstage.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc. 2. Expand/collapse subchapters.
Expected Result: Only clicked subchapter opens; others remain closed.

Test Steps: 1. Compare doc descriptions in Sonic and Backstage.
Expected Result: Descriptions match between systems.

Test Steps: 1. Search within doc. 2. Click result.
Expected Result: User is navigated to found text.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc with Mermaid diagram. 2. Observe rendering.
Expected Result: Diagram loads without needing refresh.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc. 2. Click content item. 3. Try to return to home.
Expected Result: User can return to doc home page.

Test Steps: 1. Open doc. 2. Check for table of content sections.
Expected Result: Only one table of content section is present.

Test Steps: 1. Search for a term not in doc/metadata.
Expected Result: No results are returned.

Test Steps: 1. Filter by owner. 2. Search for owner. 3. Compare results.
Expected Result: Number of results is consistent.

Test Steps: 1. Search for DORA. 2. Check numbers at left.
Expected Result: Data is cleaned and matches Backstage display.

Requirement / AC / Bug: Extra text in doc vs Backstage
Test Steps: 1. Open DORA doc in Sonic and Backstage. 2. Compare content.
Expected Result: No extra text in Sonic compared to Backstage.

Test Steps: 1. Search for a word in doc. 2. Count appearances.
Expected Result: All appearances are detected and highlighted.

Test Steps: 1. Open docs catalog. 2. Check for duplicate names.
Expected Result: No duplicate doc names are present.

Requirement / AC / Bug: Remove concept/component prefix from chapters path
Test Steps: 1. Open doc chapters. 2. Check chapter paths.
Expected Result: Paths do not include concept/component prefix.
